storyInfo: Feist takes Amiya and the Rhodes Islanders to the Self-Salvation Corps's underground hideout. The gang is introduced to the Corps's commander, Clovisia. Mandragora apologizes to the Sarkaz and forms a renewed partnership with Manfred.

attributes.content: ...One hundred and eighty-sixth day since making it back to Londinium.
Three more men joined us today. Two of them are seriously hurt. Only Robben is still able to fight.
In just this area, there are still at least seventy men in the enemy's hands.
With all of Londinium fallen, there is no telling how many soldiers have been captured.
I don't know whether they are still alive.
And I certainly don't know whether I should hope they are still alive.

Every day, someone who fought so hard to live leaves us forever. I try to remember the names of each and every one of them, but the truth is that by the time I meet these men, most of them can no longer speak.
I wish even just one more pair of ears could've heard their voices, and I wish... there could be someone here to hear my voice...
I hope you will one day see these records.
I hope your mission outside is successful.
I hope you won't be back in Londinium so soon...
Horn, we've got the new hands settled in.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Thanks, Blake. Don't give them any missions just yet. Let them rest a couple of days.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn, I don't need time to settle in! I can go out there and fight whenever!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Fine... Blake, assign Robben to 4th. He'll join the next shift as a scout.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Roger that, Horn. Perfect timing. Dublinn activity has been on the rise. We needed more men.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: The 3rd still isn't back. Robben, you should stay here and get some rest.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I can do something else...
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: I suggest you come over here and sit down. We have half an hour at most. Don't waste it.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: And I understand how you feel.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You want to go out there and fight, right? The battle this morning wasn't enough to sate your hunger.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Right, my hand is still trembling! It wants me to hold my crossbow a while longer!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Robben, remember one thing.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We are here not because we have to kill a few more Dublinn soldiers or Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Our top priority is to survive.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: After that... it's to make sure as many of us survive as possible.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn... I...
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Good. Now get some rest.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What is that you're holding?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: A notepad.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It's just some random scribblings. Pay it no mind.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You mentioned that you worked alone for a very long time.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: No wonder you have that kind of habit...
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Haha... maybe it's because I've been a captain for too long.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It felt like something was missing when I had no one to give orders to.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Thankfully, Blake and the lads stole this pen from the Dublinn forces. Otherwise I'd have to carve everything out letter by letter in the sewers.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Have you really done that before?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Go take a look at the sewers all the way at the edge of the city. You might just find my magnum opus, 'Victoria, a Brief History,' personally carved by my own hand.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Uh... How long did that take you?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: I'm just pulling your leg.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Let's save the chit-chat for another time. Dublinn could be here any moment. I'll get some sleep. You should too.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: General, Dublinn's Feline Caster is here. She wants to see you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Is she alone?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes, she didn't bring anyone else.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Let her through.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General, her Arts are hard to defend against...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: So it's your opinion that I can't handle her Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: No, that is absolutely not what I meant! General, just like General Theresis, you have my utmost respect as a warrior!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Then go back to where you belong.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes, General!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hoederer, stay here.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I'm sure you are already prepared, having met with the Confessarius's Messenger. I have a job for you.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You want me to find the people from the ship?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You worked with them before.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I'm a mercenary. Mercenaries never remember who we work with. Not unless their heads are worth a lot.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Surely it must be easily to deal with old friends, no?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Maybe...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The Babel assassin has already made it to the city center. It's the Confessarii's job to fend her off.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: As for the others... Hoederer, why don't you take a guess who they have?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The mercenaries in the city still haven't found any traces of any one of them.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: They will make their move sooner or later.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: For the past six months, our eyes in Victoria have been keeping a close eye on that ship. Yet they were always one step ahead of us, to the point that they came all the way to Londinium without any of us noticing.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Why do you think that's the case?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: There's only one possibility. There's someone working for them in Londinium.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Someone working for them... an agent.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: They must have planted this sleeper agent years ago, and this agent must be of some standing too. Otherwise, there is no way they could've escaped our watchful eyes.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Makes sense. My impression is that the Dame Doctor's methods can be... unorthodox.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Hoederer, look into the backgrounds of all the rebels we captured recently.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You think we've already caught them?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: There must be a reason why the Rhodes Islanders are still loitering nearby.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: 1:15 P.M. \ Overcast
Underground structure, Sudean Borough, Londinium
Here we are.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Old Bill, it's me. I'm back.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It's you, huh, lad? I just saw Rockrock. I thought you two left on a mission together.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Uh, she came back first since she had something to take care of.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Who are these folks you have with you... Wait, Sarkaz?!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: D-Do-Don't!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It's very likely they're the ones the commander's been waiting for!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I thought she's waiting for allies? There's no way they could be a bunch of devils!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Bill, give me a break. Where's the commander? I'll see her right now.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Think about it. Do you really think there's a chance I could be a traitor?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Not one bit. Everyone here treats you like you're their own baby brother.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Rockrock had you guard this place, right? Bring a few more men. You can escort us there.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Alright, if you say so.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: As for you lot. Don't even think about pulling any funny moves. We are watching you, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Uhh... Amiya, I feel a little unwelcome. Like, I've never felt this unwelcomed.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: I get that sense.;......;It'll be hard for us to work together.

attributes.content: Sorry. They aren't usually like this. It's just, they're a little sensitive... about how some of you look.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Things will be much better once our commander talks some sense into them. Come with me. They're having a meeting up ahead.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Did you not hear that? They blew the port up with the defensive cannons! We can't stay here any longer! It's too risky!
attributes.name: Angry Young Male Voice

attributes.content: But if we leave Sudean, it won't be easy for us to come back to help the people here.
attributes.name: Calm Middle-aged Female Voice

attributes.content: I want to help them too. You think I don't want to? But do you know where our people are locked up? Are our men supposed to search house by house in front of the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Angry Young Male Voice

attributes.content: Feist and Rockrock have been searching for information.
attributes.name: Calm Middle-aged Female Voice

attributes.content: They're too slow! The situation has changed. The Sarkaz could blow this hideout to smithereens any moment! All our hard work, gone!
attributes.name: Angry Young Male Voice

attributes.content: The hideout is dead. Those people are alive.
attributes.name: Calm Middle-aged Female Voice

attributes.content: That's awfully easy for you to say! It's not like it was you business folks who built this place from scratch, bit by bit!
attributes.name: Angry Young Male Voice

attributes.options: Seems like they're in a bit of a row.;Did we come at a bad time?

attributes.content: Haha, just a minor squabble.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Don't worry. The commander won't mind.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Most folks here come from very different backgrounds. They may not agree with each other sometimes, but all of us stand together.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Besides, no matter how out of hand their feud gets, as long as the commander is here, we'll find a solution in the end.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: Seems you really trust her.;Is she really that amazing?

attributes.content: Hm... She rescued most of us. If it wasn't for our commander, we would long have died by the hands of the Sarkaz or Dublinn.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Just like Rockrock. Her pa was beaten to death by the mercenaries because he wasn't willing to sell the defense force out.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: As for me, I didn't want to work for the Sarkaz, so me and a few coworkers ran all the way here from Highbury. We almost died of hunger in the tunnels...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: In the end, it was the commander who found us.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: She was the one who pulled each of us up from our hopelessness and united us.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: All of us look up to her, and we trust that she will lead us through each and every hopeless situation we'll come across.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Commander, help me out. We should get out of here right now, right?
attributes.name: Angry Young Male Voice

attributes.content: Commander, I suggest we start a rescue operation right away.
attributes.name: Calm Middle-aged Female Voice

attributes.content: Commander...
attributes.name: Some seven and eight other voices.

attributes.content: Harmo, Tyrell. Calm down, both of you.
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: Time is of the essence. This is no time for infighting.
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: That voice...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina, what's the matter?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: No, nothing. I might just have misheard.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Mr. Feist, is the one who last spoke your commander? She sounds... very young.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Surprising, isn't it? When I first met her, I thought the exact same thing.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Do you remember how I figured out you were the leader the moment I first saw you, Cautus lady? Soon, you'll know how I knew.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Come, let's meet our commander.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I know how you feel, everyone, but there is one point that I think requires no discussion.
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: We will save our brothers and sisters in arms.
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: If we let our enemies hurt our warriors, who would be willing to fight alongside us?
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: If we let our enemies take our friends away, who would be willing to offer us a helping hand?
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: We are the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps. We must save Londinium, but before that, we need to save each and every one of our living friends.
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: Her hands are slender and delicate. Fragile, even. Yet it seems to have enough power to quell the anger and anxiety that is about to boil over.
The meeting room falls into silence.
Those in attendance naturally cast their eyes on their commander. It is as though none of them have ever doubted whether her narrow shoulders could bear their heavy hope.
The scene is somewhat familiar.
Most of the Rhodes Island Operators feel this way. They all turn their gazes toward the Cautus who stands in front of them.
I think I know what Feist means now.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Ehhh, they really are kinda alike, right?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Everyone... quiet down. Let's not interrupt their meeting.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Looks like we have a few new friends to greet before we discuss a concrete rescue plan.
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: Feist, bring them here.
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: Uh... Yes, Commander!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Well met, Rhodes Island. I've been looking forward to your arrival.
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: I'm Clovisia, the commander of the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Young-sounding Voice

attributes.content: General, the commander of Dublinn is here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Madam Mandragora.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General... Manfred.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I trust you are here because you have something important to discuss.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You... Hmph, you saw everything, and you still put up this act?
attributes.name: Mandragora
Mandragora
attributes.content: Are you really a Sarkaz? They don't seem to be so...

attributes.name: Mandragora
attributes.content: Tricky, like you.
Madam Mandragora, your words just now could be taken as an insult to the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Whatever you say.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I'm here... to apologize anyway.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Oh? You have an apology?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: My men had a little misunderstanding with your people down at the port.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Misunderstanding?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I... I'm here because I wanted to make sure... the cooperation between us still stands.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Madam, let me remind you again. There are no concrete terms that we must follow for our cooperation to continue.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Dublinn will not interfere with Sarkaz operations in Londinium. In exchange, we will allow you to remain in a demarcated area here.
attributes.name: Manfred
Manfred
attributes.content: You can take that as a..

attributes.name: Manfred
attributes.content: Tacit understanding, between the two of us.
You told me, yes... and I haven't forgotten.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Right, and it doesn't matter if you have. We will consider the ruckus earlier a reminder.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Thank... you.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Don't be so quick to thank me. The Sarkaz are not as forgetful as you.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: What do you want me to do, then? Do you want my life? If that's what you really want...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: If that's what I actually wanted, you would not have made it here.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Hmm... and you wouldn't have taken to the steps of Westhaleg those months ago, either.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: What we want to see is a bit of sincerity from Dublinn.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: And not the kind of 'sincerity' where you snatch a few Victorian soldiers from us or kidnap a couple Londinium citizens who escaped.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It's about time that... we actually cooperate.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Horn!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I didn't want to bother you, but Salley... he's not going to last much longer! His leg is so swollen that you can't even squeeze any more pus out...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Is the 3rd back yet?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No, things were a mess outside this morning. It might have delayed things for them.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: How many men do we have?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Including the new blood, we have a total of seventeen who can fight.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: The 2nd will stay. High alert.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I'll bring five men with me and pay the Dublinn's borrowed home a little visit.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: But... if you go back, what will you do if you run into Mandragora again?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Salley can't wait much longer.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: He needs medicine. Without painkillers and anti-inflammatories, he won't even make it through the afternoon.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Do any of you have anything that's worth money? Hm? Old Ayton's been racking his brains just to figure out how to trade for enough food each day.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If we don't take it from Dublinn, who are we supposed to turn to? The Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Or do you mean to ask the civilians for help? Have you given it any thought what the enemy will do to them if they offer us anything?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Dejection won't buy us our friend's life.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Pack it up. Bring any weapons we can use. We'll leave immediately.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Robben, you said you haven't killed enough of them, right? Lucky you. Your chance is here.
attributes.name: Horn
